name: Colossal Adventure
overview: Colossal Adventure is a complete, full size version of the classic mainframe text adventure game "Adventure", with all the treasures,creatures, rooms and puzzles of the original. It was written by Pete, Mike and Nick Austin, based on the original "Adventure" game by Willie Crowther and Don Woods. It is part 1 of the Middle Earth (aka Jewels of Darkness) Trilogy.
